custom-sql.sql: SELECT {OAuth2ScopeGrant.*}, {OAuth2Authorization.*} FROM OAuth2ScopeGrant INNER JOIN OA2Auths_OA2ScopeGrants ON OAuth2ScopeGrant.oAuth2ScopeGrantId = OA2Auths_OA2ScopeGrants.oAuth2ScopeGrantId INNER JOIN OAuth2Authorization ON OAuth2Authorization.oAuth2AuthorizationId = OA2Auths_OA2ScopeGrants.oAuth2AuthorizationId WHERE (OAuth2ScopeGrant.companyId = ?)
